name: Elder Flower Facial Tonic
description:
Elder flower tea and cordial has been used for hundreds of years to help build the immune system and detoxify the body. On the skin it is known to soothe irritation and inflammation. Fennel and Lavender are known to sooth damaged and neglected skin.

The base of this tonic is Organic Witch Hazel Extract infused with elder flowers. Witch hazel has antiseptic and Astringent properties. An Astringent tightens the skin by constricting your pores! 

Directions: Cleanse face. Pour a small amount of Elder Flower Facial Tonic onto a cotton pad or ball and wipe over face with light pressure. Allow to dry and apply a moisturizer if needed. Good for all skin types.

97% ORGANIC INGREDIENTS ~ VEGAN ~ PALM OIL FREE ~ 100% NATURAL

Ingredients: Hamamelis Virginiana (Organic Witch Hazel) Extract Sambucus Nigra (Organic Elder) Flower, Lavandula Angustifolia (Organic Lavender) Distillate, Hydrolized Oat Protein, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Foeniculum Vulgare Dulce (Fennel) Oil.

2 fl. oz. / 59 ml
Ships alone or with Gift Box Option

name: Lavender Clay Mask and Cleanser- with optional gift set
description:
Our 100% Natural Mask combines oil absorbing French Green Clay with Organic Lavender Flowers and Gluten Free Organic Oatmeal to gently exfoliate and tighten your skin, and dry excess oils. This versatile product can be customized to your skin type however it changes! Best for Oily and Acneic skin.

Use it every day as a gentle soap free cleanser and once a week as a facial treatment to help tighten pores!

Directions: Spoon out about 1/2 Tablespoon into a small bowl. Mix with enough liquid to form a thin paste and massage over face, neck and décollete for 1 minute and rinse with warm water. For a skin treatment leave on until completely dry - about 15 minutes.  Rinse with warm water.

Customize it per skin type:
Dry Skin use cream or whole milk yogurt as your liquid. Normal Skin use lowfat yogurt water or floral water such as Rose water. Oily Skin use water, witch hazel or floral water.

VEGAN ~ PALM OIL FREE ~ 100% NATURAL

Ingredients: Montmorillonite (French Green Clay), Kaolinite (White Clay), Lavandula Angustifolia (Organic Lavender) Flower, Avena Sativa (Organic Gluten Free Oats), Lavandula Angustifolia (Organic Lavender) Oil, Cymbopogon Flexuosus (Organic Lemongrass) Oil. Flower Oil.

4 fl oz./ 118 ml.
Choose the Mask or the Mask Gift Set with mini mixing bowl, mini spoon in a gift box.

name: Rose Clay Mask and Cleanser - with optional gift set
description:
Our 100% Natural Mask combines purifying Kaolin Clay with Organic Dried Rose Petals and Gluten Free Organic Oatmeal to gently exfoliate your skin. Kaolin Clay does not draw oil from your skin so it is perfect for dry skin types! This versatile product can be customized to your skin type however it changes! Best for Dry, Aging and Normal skin.

Geranium imparts a light floral scent and is great for balancing the skin and oatmeal is perfect to sooth irritated or inflamed skin.

Directions: Spoon out about 1/2 Tablespoon into a small bowl. Mix with enough liquid to form a thin paste and massage over face, neck and décollete for 1 minute and rinse with warm water. For a skin treatment leave on until completely dry - about 15 minutes.  Rinse with warm water.

Customize it per skin type:
Dry Skin use cream or whole milk yogurt as your liquid. Normal Skin use lowfat yogurt water or floral water such as Rose water. Oily Skin use water, witch hazel or floral water.

VEGAN ~ PALM OIL FREE ~ 100% NATURAL

Ingredients: Kaolinite (White Clay), Rosa Centifolia (Organic Rose) Petals, Avena Sativa (Organic Gluten Free Oats), Pelargonium Graveolens (Organic Geranium) Flower Oil.

4 fl oz./ 118 ml.
Choose the Mask or the Mask Gift Set with mini mixing bowl, mini spoon in a gift box.
